short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: GRUU VIEWER is VR-enabled 360-degree panorama viewer that can be generate and share URLs by Drag and Drop.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
1, Input title your image(jpeg,png,tiff) or video(H.264).
2, Drag your file and share.
&, From the context menu.
